nodes.text: Nazzri was an astronomical object located in the regions known as the Mid Rim and the Slice. It was also situated in the grid square P-9 of the Standard Galactic Grid. A hyperspace route linked it to the celestial body Togoria as well as the Expansion Region astronomical object Vena.

Nazzri was first pictured in the current Star Wars canon in the fifty-second issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, which was published around December 30, 2015. It was first identified on a galactic map included in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a 2016 Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars Roleplaying boxed set. The planet Nazzri was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 1996 roleplaying game sourcebook Tales of the Jedi Companion, written by George R. Strayton and published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
